content: all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically about the design hello there i hope you have enjoyed knitting up an itasca beanie this beanie design was inspired by the headwaters of the mississippi river which flow from lake itasca here in minnesota the beginning of the mississippi river is a beautiful sight surrounded by beautiful pines and a still blue lake a trickling creek flows over a multitude of rocks and pebbles which you are able to walk across i am able to say that i have walked across the mighty mississippi contact @katey knits -instagram kateystolhammer@gmail com i would love to see what you create you can tag me on instagram and use the hashtag #itascabeanie when sharing pictures please feel free to sell what you make from this pattern all i ask is that you do not claim this pattern as your original design do not alter this pattern in any way to claim as your own to resell
